name: [C] Land Claim Paper Tracker
description: This is an experimental Law that tracks how many LCPs a person has in their inventory currently

properties.Title: Tracking of LCPs at Login
properties.UserDescription: every citizen starts with 10 Land Claim Papers

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

properties.Message: LCPs in your possession according to tracker:

PeopleToSendTo.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

User.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Buyer</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Buyer</ecoicon>: The buying player.

Count.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Number Of Items</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Number Of Items</ecoicon>: Number of items in the transaction

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Seller</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Seller</ecoicon>: The selling player.

RightNumber.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Number Of Items</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Number Of Items</ecoicon>: Number of items in the transaction

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ClaimOrUnclaimProperty">Claiming Land</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ClaimOrUnclaimProperty">Claiming Land</ecoicon>: Was the property claimed or unclaimed?

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ClaimOrUnclaimProperty">Unclaiming Land</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ClaimOrUnclaimProperty">Unclaiming Land</ecoicon>: Was the property claimed or unclaimed?

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.
